channel.title: Scripts won't do anything
channel.description: When i run any script, it says successfully compiled, like its going to run, then it just says successfully executed, like the scripts already been run. Im running scar 3.15b with the latest srl updates im positive, i've already spent so long getting the srl now i just want the script to run. :confused: Thanks!

item.title: Scripts won't do anything
item.dc:creator: @SRL_benjaa SRL benjaa
item.description:
@SRL_benjaa wrote:

Try closing SCAR and running again.

Maybe take a look at the Main loop, scripter may have forgotten something simple in the loop

Read full topic

item.title: Scripts won't do anything
item.dc:creator: @Bebemycat2 Bebe
item.description:
@Bebemycat2 wrote:

Make sure that you follow all of the scripts instructions and you have the client selected.

Read full topic
